Content: it is available for chains to use and I see no reason it should ever be used for PIRATE

Author: ethanv#5630
Content: At what level of coin hashrate / equihash hashrate do you think its necessary?

Author: ComputerGenie 游놊游낖游닉#7004
Content: that and I'd use my ASICs and get 100% of the supply before I'd let someone CPU mine it 游땓

Author: ComputerGenie 游놊游낖游닉#7004
Content: imo, the "minimum" would be whatever the developers of a given chain think might cause the chain to "stall" for longer than they are willing to see

Author: ComputerGenie 游놊游낖游닉#7004
Content:
if you don't care if your chain sits for days then it's of no value
if you need your chain to move but rentals can stall it, then it's a great bonus
